column3: 2015 mrs. mary frances underwood1928-2015. funeral service for mrs. mary frances underwood
column8: 2015 at 11:00 am at the chapel of radney funeral home. rev. wayne cowhick will officiate. burial will follow in the alexander city cemetery. the family will receive friends on tuesday
column10: 2015 from 9:30 am to 10:30 am at radney funeral home. mrs. underwood passed away on saturday
column12: 2015 at russell medical center. she was born on february 28
column13: 1928 in tallapoosa county to william billy mann and annie adamson mann. she was an active member of first presbyterian church. she was an excellent cook
column15: and enjoyed watching football and baseball. her favorite time was spent with her family
column16: especially her grandchildren. she is survived by her son
column19: ethan underwood and bailey underwood ; sister
column23: b l mann (edna); and special friend
column24: fannie boleware. she was preceded in death by her husband
column25: columbus albert underwood; her parents; brother
column27: martha goodwin. memorial messages may be sent to the family at www. radneyfuneralhome. com. radney funeral home is in charge of the arrangements. upcoming events. visitationjun 16. 9:30 am - 10:30 am radney funeral home1326 dadeville rd. alexander city
